movies.Title: Modern Times
movies.Actors: Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman, Tiny Sandford
movies.Plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.Title: Sunset Blvd.
movies.Writer: Charles Brackett, Billy Wilder, D.M. Marshman Jr.
movies.Actors: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim, Nancy Olson
movies.Plot: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

movies.Title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movies.Writer: Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Terry Southern (screenplay), Peter George (screenplay), Peter George (based on the book: "Red Alert" by)
movies.Actors: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn
movies.Plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically try to stop.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 13 wins & 4 nominations.

movies.Title: Apocalypse Now
movies.Writer: John Milius, Francis Ford Coppola, Michael Herr (narration)
movies.Actors: Marlon Brando, Martin Sheen, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest
movies.Plot: During the U.S.-Viet Nam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.
